channel.title: [PI] Chaotic planet - 602+ stuff [SUMMONING 100%]
channel.description:
Server: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/78828741/Chaotic%20Planet.rar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/78828741/Chaotic%20Planet.rar[/url] Client: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/78828741/client.rar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/78828741/client.rar[/url]
Features: - Summoning (100%) - Full-screen - 634 character models - 634 items - 634 animations - 634 gfx - 508 maps - XP counter - 562 gameframe - New HP bars and fading hitmarks - Sprite outlining - Curses - 602 skilltab with hovers - 9 different crowns, one for each playerRights - Lots of model fixes have been applied - Items kept on death interface fully working - New bank interface with working deposit buttons - New shop interface - Some interface snippets have been added, the starters interface for example - New text engine implemented - Improved game engine A LOT
Media:
New interfaces [img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/8875/pk4.png[/img]
Ganodermic [img]http://s16.postimg.org/l54mw85cl/Naamloos.png[/img]
Credits: Gabbe (fixed some buggy models) Kemp (game engine) Sanity (source)

BrettR
